text: Quinn Henderson Becker (June 11, 1930 - March 13, 2022) was an American orthopedic surgeon and lieutenant general in the U.S. Army. He was the 36th Surgeon General of the United States Army from 1985 to 1988. He attended Louisiana State University's School of Medicine. He was born in Kirksville, Missouri. Becker died on March 13, 2022 at his home in San Antonio, Texas at the age of 91.Obituary of Quinn H. Becker, M.D. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American generals Category:American physicians Category:Military people from Missouri
title: Quinn H. Becker
